name: Ashland 墲人之境
description:
Ashland is an asymmetric game (4v1) based on the adventure of raiders.In the game, one player plays a powerful tomb keeper, driving out four adventurers played by other players.They will continue to collaborate, declassify, explore, hide and chase each other in dusty underground palaces for thousands of years until the ruins collapse.

form a team of well-matched adventurers

In order to save, truth, and protect, adventurers with different purposes gather in search of the fabled ruins that are said to hold the magical power to realize their vision.
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} / extras/maoxianzhe PNG [/ img]

into the dangerous ruins

Ancient "Ash people" by force of seven obsidian storing sites, how can we break and get this power?
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} / extras/changjing1 PNG [/ img]

what happened to the tomb keepers

Unable to let go of their obsession, they became the keeper of the tomb of their loved ones, relying on the power of ashes for thousands of years to guard the seven sidian relics and drive out all things entering this place.
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} / extras/duomaomao PNG [/ img]

use props and environment to chase each other for escape

Brazier, dragon claw, engineer shovel, trap, compass...Wait a moment, who can win in this chase game, in addition to walk, see who can better use these props and environment.

crack agencies find treasures

Finally under the watchman's eyes will be cracked, treasures show in front of the adventurers, but they can bear the watchman's anger?
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} / extras/poyi PNG [/ img]

scramble and escape

Who can carry treasure to escape, who can recapture treasure?Who knows...
